name: Dicetective
description:
It's do or die in this dicey detective drama! In Dicetective, you enter the role of the world-class dice detective when suddenly, tragedy strikes and mystery is born. Get ready to meet many faces... of the six on a dice, that is, on your quest to solve the mystery.

Dicetective was made in 48 hours for the GMTK Game Jam 2022. The theme was Roll of the Dice.
